Parameters: String: a string identifying the file or null if not known.
String: a string identifying the other file or null if there isn't another file or if not known
String: a reason message with additional information or null
FileSystemException(java.lang.String,jav.Description: Constructs an instance of this class. This constructor should be used when an operation involving two files fails, or there is additional information to explain the reason.
FileSystemException(java.lang.String,jav.FullName: public FileSystemException (String file, String other, String reason)

Parameters: String: a string identifying the file or null if not known.
FileSystemException(java.lang.String).Description: Constructs an instance of this class. This constructor should be used when an operation involving one file fails and there isn't any additional information to explain the reason.

Returns: the string explaining why the file system operation failed
getReason().Description: Returns the string explaining why the file system operation failed.

getOtherFile().Description: Returns the other file used to create this exception.

Returns: the detail message string of this Throwable instance (which may be null).

getFile().Description: Returns the file used to create this exception.

ClassDesc: Thrown when a file system operation fails on one or two files. This class is the general class for file system exceptions.
